Package entrants.utils.graph

Class DiscreteKnowledgeGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • entrants.utils.graph.UndirectedGraph<Node,Edge>
      • entrants.utils.graph.DiscreteKnowledgeGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUndirectedGraph<Node,Edge>
    public class DiscreteKnowledgeGraph
extends UndirectedGraph<Node,Edge>
    This class is used to simplify a KnowledgeGraph by only taking into account the interesting nodes

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface entrants.utils.graph.interfaces.IUndirectedGraph

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscreteKnowledgeGraph

        public DiscreteKnowledgeGraph​(UndirectedGraph<Node,Edge> graph)
        Initializes the discrete graph with a target KnowledgeGraph. At initialization, All the nodes of the target KnowledgeGraph are checked (can be time consuming)
        Parameters:
        graph - The target graph

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the graph by rechecking all the source graph's nodes. Removes the nodes that are no longer intresting. Adds the nodes that became interesting.

      • update

        public void update​(java.util.Collection<Node> updatedNodes)
        Updates the graph by rechecking all the given nodes Removes the nodes that are no longer intresting. Adds the nodes that became interesting.
        Parameters:
        updatedNodes - The nodes to recheck
